channel.title: [Showoff] Shiney PoleArm [/showoff]
channel.description:
this is used of both Tracing and prims :P you can tell whats a prim and whats a trace
** trace pic not available cuz i have not scanned it :P ** one of my ideas i drew in school a few mounths ago...**
anyway... heres pics CLose up at blade part [img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/870/polearm3.png[/img] Wire frame [img]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/7749/polearm2.png[/img] and whole blade [img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/8444/polearm1.png[/img]
this pole arm is a normal polearm and many games prob have a simular polearm...
Rate and comment
PS: it is for a RSPS >.> so i dident add much details to it... i will release soon after i release the other model i promised

item.title: [Showoff] Shiney PoleArm [/showoff]
item.dc:creator: @The_Arcanian The Arcanian
item.description:
@The_Arcanian wrote:

You coulda do the blade with prims too.
Ehh, it was just like yesterday when i was tracing and didnt even want to try primitives… but now i have understud that primitives are much better, and easyer.

Overall 2/10

It’s a 5 minute work!

Read full topic
